message: I'm feeling generous, Bob. Take 100,000 and let's get this over with!
Alice, let's be reasonable.  My turn now.  I propose a 70/30 split.
Okay, Bob, I'll go down a little.  Let's split it 80/20, and I'll take the bigger slice this time.  Come on, let's get this done!
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a little, but we're still not close. 60/40 is my final offer.
Bob, we're getting closer.  I'm willing to go down to 70/30, but this is my final offer.  Let's not waste any more time.
Alice, time is running out. This is my final offer. Let's end this now and both walk away with something.
Bob, we're running out of time.  I'm dropping down to 60/40. This is my final offer. If we don't agree, we both lose.
